mapper.select: select et.name as envType ,et.secret ,cfg.*,p.name as projectName from env_type et right join config cfg on et.id = cfg.env_type_id left join project p on cfg.project_id = p.id left join project_member pm on p.id = pm.project_id where pm.uid = #{uid} and et.public_flag = #{publicFlag} and cfg.delete_flag = 0 and cfg.env_name like concat('%',#{envName},'%' ) and p.name like concat('%',#{projectName},'%' ) order by cfg.id desc
